name: Grapple Link
description:
After the opposing side takes Burning DMG, or your other characters use a Technique: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Nightsoul point.
When Nightsoul points are at 2: Attach Grapple Prepare to the character to which this is attached, then consume 2 Nightsoul points. (After Grapple Prepare is attached, before your characters select their actions, if the attached character is the active character: Deal 3 Dendro DMG to the nearest opponent)
Duration (Rounds): 2
